oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Coffee - Waking Crew advertisements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Advertisements for American Ace Coffee, as read by an unidentified announcer during a broadcast of WSM program The Waking Crew. Recording also contains multiple performances by Bob Johnstone, Marvin Hughes, the WSM orchestra, and news reports read by Bill Williams.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marvin Hughes; Bob Johnstone

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Williams, Bill (Newsreader); Johnstone, Bob (Vocalist); Hughes, Marvin; WSM Orchestra;
